content.content: Hello guys. How can I get the voting power? What kind of operations should I do for it? I’ve donated to two projects and played some games.

Slt pour répondre a ta question pour obtenir le droit de vote il te faut avoir des jetons Gitcoin sur ton address eth tu peu obtenir des jetons en effectuant un swap sur uniswap pour que tu échange ton eth en Gitcoin est a ce moment la en connectant ton wallet tu vera pourra participé au droit de vote . En espérant avoir pu répondre a ta question

Also have a question here, I’ve claimed my GTC (as shown in Quadratic Lands page) and trying to vote on some proposals. Portis wallet connects but somehow is unsuccessful in the Gitcoin page. I am successful logging in, BUT the wallet address has a “?” beside it. Therefore no GTC available. Any help is much appreciated, thank you!
